FISSPy Image¶

fisspy.image.base Module¶

Basic image process tool.

Functions¶

rescale(orig, dimensions[, method, center, ...]) Returns a new numpy.ndarray that has been resampled up or down.
rot_trans(x, y, xc, yc, angle[, dx, dy, inv]) Rotational transpose for input array of x, y and angle.
img_interpol(img, xa, ya, xt, yt[, missing]) Interpolate the image for a given coordinates.
rotation(img, angle, x, y, xc, yc[, dx, dy, ...]) Rotate the input image with angle and center position.
rot(img, angle[, xc, yc, dx, dy, xmargin, ...]) Rotate the input image.
shift(image, shift) Shift the given image.

fisspy.image.coalignment Module¶

Alignment FISS data.

Functions¶

alignoffset(image0, template0) Align the two images
fiss_align_inform(file[, smooth]) Calculate the fiss align information, and save to npz file.
match_wcs(fiss_file[, smooth]) Match the wcs information of FISS files with the SDO/HMI file.
manual(fiss_file, sdo_file[, smooth]) Align the FISS data with the SDO maually.
